attributes.action: Establish a Charitable Trust to Buy Soldiers Return from Active Service a BEER (or something similar)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After watching Ross Kemp talk to the soldiers about what would be the first thing they would do when they get back after fighting for us in Irag & Afganistan they all wanted to do simple things such as have a pint, eat fish & chips & sleep!

I ask the Prime Minister to establish a charity that allows the public and companies to donate money and goods that can be given to the soldiers as a thank you on returning to the UK.

And of course make this thankyou gift expemt from tax!
